selected_skills.name: map_length_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the result of the comparison between the number of tiny gray bicycles and the number of things to the left of the tiny green bicycle to a multiple-choice option.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the skill to convert the comparison result into the corresponding multiple-choice option label.

new_skill_specs.name: count_objects_in_diagram
new_skill_specs.purpose: Count the number of specified objects in a diagram.

new_skill_specs.name: compare_counts
new_skill_specs.purpose: Compare two counts and return 'greater', 'less', or 'equal'.
edge_cases: One or both counts are zero
